titles: Act discharging any to travel thorow the Highlands, with more persons than the law allows. Edinburgh, the tenth day of October, 1678.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Al. Gibson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Forbids inhabitants of the Highlands to travel with any persons not their domestic servants.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Freedom of movement --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
